title: Constantly keep inbox and all folders updated
content: I sometimes look into a sub-folder under email inbox account (imap) in thunderbird and can see it is just updating. Is there a specific setting where I can keep all folders and sub-folders constantly updated?
creator: nospam17

title: Thunderbird won't configure second gmail account. errors "400. That’s an error.  The server cannot process the request because it is malformed. It should not be retried. That’s all we know."
content:
New Laptop. Windows 11. Bitdefender protection. Installed Thunderbird and a first gmail account on new Laptop, all OK. Attempting to instal a second, different gmail account I get the following message from Google: 

"400. That’s an error.  The server cannot process the request because it is malformed. It should not be retried. That’s all we know."

No problem having installing the 2nd gmail account in my internet browser on new laptop after continued failures to instal in Thunderbird. NB I have both gmail accounts previously (and easily) installed and working in Thunderbird on PC, old laptop, phone. Issue does not make sense. Does anyone have a solution please.
creator: ross.fiddes

title: How do I restore emails from an email backup?
content: How do I restore emails from an email backup (that is NOT a backed-up profile zip file) that has been saved using ImportExportToolsNG? I used ImportExportTools NG to create an email backup. The backup is in the forms of files in a set of folders (calendar-data, crashes, datareporting, extensions etc.). It is not in the form of a zip file.
creator: leon.arundell
